projects.name: Falling Lights
projects.alt: Streaks of colored lights falling down

projects.name: Geometric Constellations
projects.alt: Circles floating in space connecting with other nearby circles to create constellations

projects.name: Rainbow Black Hole
projects.alt: A rainbow of colors descending towards the center of a circle

projects.name: Cubic Audio Visualizer
projects.alt: An audio visualizer that uses colored cubes to display the audio level

projects.name: Falling Text
projects.alt: Small sequences of randomly changing letters falling down

projects.name: Reaching Arms
projects.alt: Many arms reaching out from the center giving the illusion of being pulled in

projects.name: Futuristic Audio Visualizer
projects.alt: An audio visualizer that uses moving bars and many dots to display the audio level

projects.name: Rotating Spiral
projects.alt: A series of dots, emanating from the center, slowly expanding outwards in a rotating spiral

projects.name: Random Walkers
projects.alt: Multiple colored walkers move out along random paths from the center

projects.name: Abstract Squares
projects.alt: A series of collections of randomly placed colored squares

projects.name: Bouncing Laser
projects.alt: A laser bouncing around randomly hitting nodes

projects.name: Gradient Circuit
projects.alt: A circuit shape generated with a gradient of colors from the center

projects.name: Meteor Shower
projects.alt: Small lines of light coming from the center of the screen to create a meteor shower effect

projects.name: Rainbow Arcs
projects.alt: Rainbow colored arcs orbit around the center of the screen creating optical illusions
